verses.text: And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, Behold now, the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where we \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with thee is too \w strait|strong="H6862"\w* for us.

Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, we pray thee, unto \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thence every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w beam|strong="H6982"\w*, and let us \w make|strong="H6213"\w* us a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* there, where we may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye.

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Be \w content|strong="H2974"\w*, I pray thee, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.
So he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with them. And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, they cut \w down|strong="H1504"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

But as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* was \w felling|strong="H5307"\w* a \w beam|strong="H6982"\w*, the axe \w head|strong="H1270"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and he \w cried|strong="H6817"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w master|strong="H0113"\w*! for it was \w borrowed|strong="H7592"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft axe head: Heb. iron\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Where|strong="H0575"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* it? And he \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* him the \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. And he cut \w down|strong="H7094"\w* a \w stick|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* in thither; and the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* did \w swim|strong="H6687"\w*.
Therefore \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he, Take \add it\add* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* to thee. And he put \w out|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* it.

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w warred|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and took \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* with his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In \w such|strong="H6423"\w* and \w such|strong="H0492"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add shall be\add* my \w camp|strong="H8466"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft camp: or, encamping\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* that thou \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* not \w such|strong="H2088"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; for thither the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* are come \w down|strong="H5185"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* him and \w warned|strong="H2094"\w* him of, and \w saved|strong="H8104"\w* himself there, not \w once|strong="H0259"\w* nor \w twice|strong="H8147"\w*.

Therefore the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* was sore \w troubled|strong="H5590"\w* for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*; and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Will ye not \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* me which of us \add is\add* for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, None, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: but \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w telleth|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that thou \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* in thy \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w*.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft None: Heb. No\f*

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w spy|strong="H7200"\w* \w where|strong="H0351"\w* he \add is\add*, that I may \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* him. And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add he is\add* in \w Dothan|strong="H1886"\w*.

Therefore \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* he thither \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w host|strong="H2428"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w compassed|strong="H5362"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w about|strong="H5362"\w*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft great: Heb. heavy\f*

And when the \w servant|strong="H8334"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, behold, an \w host|strong="H2428"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* both with \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*. And his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, my \w master|strong="H0113"\w*! how shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?\f + \fr 6.15 \ft the servant: or, the minister\f*
And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not: for they that \add be\add* with us \add are\add* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* than they that \add be\add* with them.

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, I pray thee, \w open|strong="H6491"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, that he may \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w*; and he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*: and, behold, the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \add was\add* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*.

And when they came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to him, \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* this \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, I pray thee, with \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w*. And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with \w blindness|strong="H5575"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*.

¶ And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, This \add is\add* not the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, neither \add is\add* \w this|strong="H2090"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* me, and I will \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* you to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom ye \w seek|strong="H1245"\w*. But he \w led|strong="H3212"\w* them to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.\f + \fr 6.19 \ft follow…: Heb. come ye after me\f*

And it came to pass, when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, that \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w open|strong="H6491"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of these \add men\add*, that they may \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w opened|strong="H6491"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*; and, behold, \add they were\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*, when he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* them, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, shall I \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \add them\add*? shall I \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \add them\add*?

And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt not \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \add them:\add* wouldest thou \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* those whom thou hast taken \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* with thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* and with thy \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*? \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, that they may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to their \w master|strong="H0113"\w*.

And he \w prepared|strong="H3739"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w provision|strong="H3740"\w* for them: and when they had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, he sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to their \w master|strong="H0113"\w*. So the \w bands|strong="H1416"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass after \w this|strong="H0310"\w*, that \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all his \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And there was a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: and, behold, they \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* it, until an \w ass’s|strong="H2543"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* was \add sold\add* for \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the fourth \w part|strong="H7255"\w* of a \w cab|strong="H6894"\w* of \w dove’s dung|strong="H1686"\w* for \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And as the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* was passing \w by|strong="H5674"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, there \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Help|strong="H3467"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do not \w help|strong="H3467"\w* thee, \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* shall I \w help|strong="H3467"\w* thee? out of the \w barnfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, or out of the \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*?\f + \fr 6.27 \ft If…: or, Let not the \+nd LORD\+nd* save thee\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, What aileth thee? And she \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, This \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that we may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* him to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and we will \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*.

So we \w boiled|strong="H1310"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* him: and I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her on the \w next|strong="H0312"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that we may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* him: and she hath \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 6.29 \ft next: Heb. other\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*; and he passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, \add he had\add* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* upon his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so and \w more|strong="H3254"\w* also to me, if the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* on him this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

But \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* with him; and \add the king\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: but ere the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to him, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w* ye how this \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w murderer|strong="H7523"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*? \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, when the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and hold him \w fast|strong="H3905"\w* at the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*: \add is\add* not the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him?

And while he yet \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with them, behold, the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto him: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add is\add* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; what should I \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* any longer?
